caption.body: With a deceptively simple concept, filmmakers Alex Gorosh and Wylie Overstreet invite passersby in Los Angeles to gaze upon what they’ve looked at all their lives but never seen, evoking a common response of wonder and revealing our shared humanity.  See "A New View of the Moon" by Alex Gorosh and Wylie Overstreet, now playing in the Video Arts gallery, located pre-security in the International Terminal. http://bit.ly/2BzNiEk
